comments:
I have an application which is reading serailized object from a directory
and 
processing those. Whenever I debug that application from within Eclipse
ver 2.1 Build 200212181304, using JDK 1.3.1 . I get debug exception and a
dialog box pops up with javaw.exe error and terminates the process.

I can run other processes just fine withing eclipse.
